name: Presentation Projector
description: Portable projector kit with HDMI adapters for seminars and classes.
usageRules: Handle the lens carefully and use a case when moving between rooms.
Use surge-protected power and avoid loose connections.
Return all accessories (HDMI/DP adapters, remote, power cable) packed in the kit.
Late or damaged return may incur fines and a temporary booking suspension.

name: GPU Workstation A6000
description: High-memory CUDA workstation for deep learning model training; local login only.
location: CSE Lab Office, Room CS-204 (collect/return with lab assistant)
usageRules: Use institute credentials; do not share accounts.
Mining or non-academic workloads are prohibited.
Save work to the user home or designated project drive; do not write to system folders.
No food or drinks near the workstation.
Do not power down unless instructed by lab staff; log out at session end.
Policy violations may lead to account suspension and booking revocation.

name: GPU Server Node-01 (SSH)
description: Remote-access GPU node for queued training with reserved SSH windows.
location: Provisioning via CSE Systems Desk, CS-201 (account enabling only)
usageRules: Access is permitted only during the booked window.
Limit GPU and memory usage to the assigned quota.
Terminate jobs at least 15 minutes before the end of the booking.
Store data only under the assigned project/user path; clean temporary files.
Non-compliance may result in job termination and suspension of future bookings.

name: Data Processing Workstation-128G
description: 16-core CPU, 128 GB RAM for preprocessing and simulations.
location: CSE Compute Room, CS-118 (check-in/out with assistant)
usageRules: Login with campus ID; admin access is not provided.
Use the scratch or project path for storage; system directories are restricted.
Remove personal media after the session; do not leave unattended data.
Unattended sessions exceeding 15 minutes may be terminated by staff.
Repeated misuse may lead to access revocation.

name: MATLAB Licence Seat
description: Time-bound floating seat for MATLAB/Simulink; limited concurrent seats.
location: CSE Systems Desk, CS-201 (seat activation during slot)
usageRules: Seat activates only for the booked time window.
Do not share the licence or credentials.
Close MATLAB/Simulink at the end of the session.
Misuse or sharing may result in blacklisting and disciplinary action.

name: Ansys Licence Seat
description: CAE licence seat for structural/thermal simulations; queue-based allocation.
usageRules: Use only for academic or institute-approved projects.
Exporting files off-campus requires prior approval from the Systems Desk.
End the session promptly and release the seat.
Violations may lead to licence revocation for the semester.

name: IDE Debug Kit (USB Pods)
description: Set of hardware debuggers for embedded coursework; checked out per slot.
usageRules: Inspect the kit at checkout and report any missing or damaged items immediately.
Use ESD precautions when connecting pods and targets.
Return all adapters, cables, and pods; count items at return.
Late return may trigger a booking freeze; negligence may incur replacement charges.

name: Code Review Station
description: Screen-recording workstation for usability studies and code demos.
location: Media Nook, CS-112 (sign in/out with TA)
usageRules: Obtain consent from participants before recording.
Store recordings in the project folder; do not store on the desktop.
Clear personal data and sign out at the end of the session.
Policy violations may result in content deletion and an access ban.

name: Digital Oscilloscope 200MHz
description: 4-channel scope for time/frequency-domain measurements; probes included.
usageRules: Use correct probe attenuation and compensate probes before measurement.
Avoid exceeding input voltage limits and observe grounding.
Return with probe tips capped and cables coiled.
Misuse may lead to an equipment ban and damage charges.

name: Function/Signal Generator
description: Arbitrary waveform generator with sweep and modulation.
usageRules: Start with low amplitude and increase gradually.
Verify 50Ω load or correct output setting before connecting.
Return cables neatly coiled and labeled.
Damage due to misuse may be billed to the user or group.

name: Spectrum Analyzer
description: RF spectrum analysis with marker/peak search; SMA adapters included.
usageRules: Never exceed the maximum RF input power; use attenuators if needed.
Use DC blocks for biased signals and verify connections before enabling RF.
Complete pre- and post-use checklists with the technician.
Violations may result in RF lab access suspension.

name: Logic Analyzer Kit
description: Logic analyzer with clips and leads for bus tracing.
usageRules: Use ESD precautions and connect ground first.
Clip correctly to avoid shorts and strain on headers.
Count accessories on return; report missing items.
Lost leads or damage will be charged to the user.

name: Vector Network Analyzer (VNA)
description: S-parameter measurements; calibration required before session.
usageRules: Perform SOLT calibration at the start of the session using approved standards.
Avoid bending or over-torquing RF cables and connectors.
Report measurement drift or anomalies immediately to the technician.
Non-compliance may end the session and flag future bookings.

name: FPGA/SoC Board (Xilinx)
description: Development board with JTAG and power kit; accessories included.
usageRules: Check board condition at issue and note serial number.
Use only the supplied power adapter; do not use external PSUs.
Return the board in its ESD bag with all accessories.
Late return freezes kit access for one week.

name: Soldering Workbench Station
description: ESD-safe bench with iron, hot-air, and fume extractor; PPE required.
usageRules: Wear PPE (glasses, gloves as appropriate) and enable fume extraction.
Keep flammables away; set temperatures per material guidelines.
Clean and tin tips after use; leave the bench tidy.
Burns or damage due to negligence will be reported and billed.

name: PCB Prototype Press
description: Rapid prototyping lamination/press for PCB layers (training required).
usageRules: Valid training certificate is required before use.
Follow the temperature and pressure SOP; do not exceed limits.
Allow the machine to cool down before handover.
Misuse voids access and may incur repair charges.

name: FDM 3D Printer
description: PLA/ABS prints; provide STL; nozzle/material guidelines apply.
usageRules: Pre-slice and estimate print duration; include supports if required.
Use only approved filaments; lab staff loads filament and starts prints.
Clean the build plate and area after completion.
Failed prints due to user error consume quota and may incur material charges.

name: SLA 3D Printer
description: Resin prints with post-cure; PPE and curing time required.
usageRules: Wear gloves and avoid skin contact with resin; use eye protection when required.
Lab staff handles resin pouring and tank operations.
Ensure full wash and UV cure as per material guidelines.
Spills or improper handling may incur cleanup fees and access suspension.

name: CNC Mini Mill
description: Small-format CNC for soft metals and plastics; training and supervisor required.
usageRules: Complete the safety briefing and present authorization before use.
Provide CAM files and toolpaths; verify work offsets and tool lengths.
Clamp the workpiece securely; do not leave the machine unattended.
Damage due to misuse is billed at repair cost and may revoke access.

name: Lathe Trainer
description: Educational lathe for turning operations; PPE mandatory.
usageRules: Wear eye protection and tie back long hair; remove jewelry.
Keep guards in place and use the chuck key safely (never leave it in).
A supervisor must be present for all operations.
Unsafe behavior ends the session and may trigger disciplinary action.

name: Universal Testing Machine
description: Tensile/compression testing with extensometer; technician-operated.
usageRules: The technician operates the machine; users must not override controls.
Declare specimen dimensions and material before setup.
Do not exceed rated loads; stop on abnormal noises or readings.
Non-compliance ends the test; damages may be billed to project grants where applicable.

name: Hardness Tester
description: Rockwell/Brinell hardness measurements; standard indenter sets.
usageRules: Select the correct hardness scale and indenter.
Place specimens flat and clean; avoid surface contaminants.
Log results in the lab register and export if needed.
Return with indenter protected; misuse may result in repair fees and booking block.

name: Wind Tunnel Rig
description: Educational subsonic wind tunnel; setup/teardown buffer required.
usageRules: Attend the pre-run checklist with the supervisor.
Secure models and instrumentation; verify balance calibration.
Observe cooldown and shutdown procedures; leave the area tidy.
Unauthorized modifications lead to immediate suspension and liability for damages.

name: Heat Exchanger Test Rig
description: Shell-and-tube/plate exchanger experiments; cooldown buffer enforced.
usageRules: Operate strictly per the lab SOP and supervisor guidance.
Monitor temperatures and pressures; do not bypass interlocks.
Allow cooldown before shutdown; clean any spills immediately.
Unsafe operation triggers shutdown and booking penalties.

name: Laser Cutter
description: Laser cutting for wood, acrylic, and card; approved materials only.
usageRules: Complete the safety briefing and material approval.
Use only approved materials; keep the lid closed while cutting.
Stay with the machine during jobs; do not leave unattended.
Clean the bed and filter tray after use; violations may result in a ban and repair fees.

name: Desktop CNC Router
description: Small-format routing/milling for panels; bit library available.
usageRules: Fix stock securely; set correct bit, feeds, and speeds.
Supervise the machine at all times during operation.
Report broken bits; replace if due to misuse.
Repeated incidents may trigger a semester ban.

name: Large-format Plotter
description: A0/A1 plotting; queue-managed booking; paper at cost.
usageRules: Load paper only as instructed by staff; verify print preview before printing.
Use correct color profiles and quality settings to avoid waste.
Remove scraps and leave the area clean.
Jams or damage due to negligence are charged; repeated waste leads to access restriction.

name: Photo Printer
description: High-quality photo prints up to A3+; color-calibrated.
usageRules: Use approved media and run nozzle checks before long jobs.
Allow sufficient drying time; handle prints with care.
Wasted ink/paper due to misuse may be billed; persistent misuse leads to a ban.

name: Model-making Bench
description: Cutting mats, vices, and hand tools; PPE and cleanup required.
usageRules: Wear PPE and cap blades when not in use.
Keep the work area organized; return shared tools to their racks.
Clean the station after use; unsafe or unclean return may suspend bookings for one week.

name: Foam Cutter
description: Hot-wire foam cutter; material guidelines apply.
usageRules: Use only approved foam materials in a ventilated area.
Avoid contact with the hot wire; use jigs and guides where possible.
Stop on fumes or burning; report issues to staff.
Misuse causes immediate stop and access ban; injury risk is the user’s responsibility if SOP is ignored.

name: VR Station
description: VR setup for design walkthroughs; supervised slots.
usageRules: Sanitize the headset and controllers before and after use.
Use wrist straps; maintain clear play area.
Report nausea or discomfort; pause if needed.
Damages due to negligence may be billed; repeated incidents revoke access.

name: Portable Lighting Kit
description: LED panels with stands and diffusers for critiques.
usageRules: Do not tilt stands beyond marked limits; sandbag when necessary.
Coil cables neatly and avoid sharp bends.
Return diffuser cloths clean and dry; count all accessories at return.
Loss or damage incurs replacement fees and may trigger a booking freeze.
